entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 06:30 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
